title: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model TerminalAreaLocation
description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport Terminal building.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to TerminalAreaLocation.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Terminal Area Location.

AirportLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport.

Latitude.description: Property. Coordinate for latitude of the Airport.

Longitude.description: Property. Coordinate for longitude of the Airport.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Airport Location.

Srid.description: Property. A Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID), to identify the spatial coordinate system definitions.
